## DynamicVersionInfo type

Represents information about the dynamic version of a Versioned Item.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type DynamicVersionInfo = {
    $type?: string;
    Revision?: number;
    RevisionDate?: string;
    Revisor?: Link;
};
```
